_aChangeLog.text: visual adjustment (light render, specular, build, skybox)
- All stages are a little harder
- Different covers and triggers have been added in all stages
- Rocks don't block you but do more damage
- Stage 4 winners get a special skin
- Somes areaportal have been added for better FPS
- New song for warmup and zm immunity added for this one

_aLatestUpdates._sText:
ze_Serpentis_Temple_v2


This new version don't have much new content but it's more challenging and optimized.

I hope you will like it.

It's the last time i change something on this map, if you find bugs / problem report them to me on steam please.

_sText:
ze_Serpentis_Temple_v2

___________________________

This map is based of the MG map : mg_Serpentis_Temple by Kaemon and Luffaren

Lot of builds and models / textures were created by Kaemon and Luffaren.

Many asset of the original mg map were used.

MG map : http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/181459

Special thanks : Noctali / Moltard / Metro / Kaemon / Luffaren / Batnik

___________________________

- 5 STAGES
- 3 item for humans
- Admin room
- Custom skins
- 3 BOSS
- 64 spawns player

____________________________

You can add me on steam ( Nostar ) to give me idea or if you find bug.

____________________________

INSTALLATION :

- unzip the .rar folder
- Move the file in this directory : Steam\steamapps\common\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\download\maps
